titleStmt.title: An epitaph upon His late Majesty, King Charles the II.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for P[hilip]. Brooksby, at the Golden-Ball, in Pye-Corner:,

notesStmt.note: Verse: "The statue, which the Rhodians say,".
Place of publication and printer's name from Wing CD-ROM, 1996.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
